alumniOf.name:
NY. He served in the U.S. Air Force from 2000-2007. He is a veteran of Operation Enduring Freedom and received the Joint Service Achievement Medal for his work as a Spanish linguist for the Defense Intelligence Agency in 2005. William graduated from Campbell University in 2007 with a degree in computer science. He earned his J.D. in 2011 from the North Carolina Central University School of Law. His practice areas include immigration law and criminal defense cases. He is licensed and in good standing with the State Bar of North Carolina and a member of the American Immigration Lawyer Association (AILA.) He is a proud member of the Charlotte community and provides compassionate counsel for all his clients.

content.heroSection:
Orlando, FL Auto Accident Lawyers

Were you recently involved in a car accident? If you were not at fault, you are entitled to seek compensation. Unfortunately, insurance companies can be reluctant to pay you what you are owed! Luckily, when you work with the Orlando auto accident lawyers of Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we can aggressively pursue the compensation you deserve. 

If you have been injured in an accident through no fault of your own, you shouldn’t have to worry about communicating with insurance companies, fighting for damages, or facing stressful legal processes. Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, can assess the damages you are owed and make a thorough legal case while you focus on healing. 

Reach out today to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can help you pursue the compensation you need. 

How Our Orlando Auto Accident Lawyers Can Help

When you are out on the road, there are many types of accidents you might face, and each one requires a particular legal strategy. For example, if you experience a collision with a commercial vehicle, you will have to deal with the insurance policies of that company, as well as their interest in protecting their driver from legal ramifications. 

Our Orlando auto accident lawyers can help you with several different types of vehicle accidents, including:

  • Truck accidents (including semis, tractor trailers, and other commercial vehicles)
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Drunk driving accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Hit and runs
  • Accidents caused by uninsured drivers
  • Accidents involving emergency vehicles
  • Accidents involving public or mass transportation 
  • And others!

If you have experienced one of these types of accidents, we can work with you to assess and pursue the compensation you are owed. Remember, no two accidents are the same, which is why we work with you to build a case using evidence from the accident, including the police report, photographs, and witness statements.

We Can Help You Seek Compensation

When you are in a car accident, the first rule you need to know is to never admit fault. If you admit fault, you can essentially say goodbye to any money you might have otherwise been owed. Always consult with legal counsel before telling your side of the story! You are likely in shock following an accident, and you do not have all of the information, so it’s best to say less until the lawyers of Vasquez Law Firm can help you assess the damages, gather evidence, communicate with insurance companies, and tailor a legal strategy that fits your needs.

We know what you need in order to heal correctly and move on with the next stage of your life. When you are found not at fault for your accident, you are owed compensation that can cover: 

  • Hospitalization and related medical bills
  • Surgery
  • Exams
  • X-rays, MRIs, etc.
  • Ambulatory transport
  • Medications
  • Medical devices
  • Lost wages 
  • Vehicle repair or replacement 
  • And more!

Do not trust insurance companies to look out for your best interests. They will try to minimize your suffering so they don’t have to pay as much as you are owed. Let us handle the legal details and fighting while you have peace of mind during your recovery. 

Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, Can Help You Get The Compensation You Are Owed

For over 35 years, Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, has helped survivors of auto accidents get back on their feet by pursuing compensation on their behalf. If you have suffered an accident, you need the time and resources to heal, which is where our experienced Orlando auto accident lawyers come in. We will fight aggressively to get the damages you are owed, even if insurance companies are reluctant to pay the full amount. Reach out to schedule a free initial consultation, and learn how we can be your champions throughout this trying time.

Frequently Asked Questions

The other driver did not have insurance. Can I still pursue damages?

If you are hit by an uninsured driver, you are still owed damages. We can help you get compensation from your own insurance company since you are covered under your own plan. 

Can I submit dashcam evidence?

If you had your dash cam operating at the time of the accident, the footage can help your case go more quickly and with less hassle. Don’t hesitate to share this evidence with us!

Can I still get compensation if I was a passenger?

If you were injured in an auto accident as a passenger, you are still entitled to compensation. Whichever party was at-fault, you can file a claim against them.

Practice Areas

  • Orlando, FL Auto Accident Lawyers
  • Orlando, FL Immigration Lawyers
  • Orlando, FL Workers’ Comp Lawyers

mainEntity.name: How long does the immigration process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration timelines vary greatly depending on your case type. Green card applications can take 8-33 months, while citizenship typically takes 8-12 months. Contact Vasquez Law Firm for a personalized timeline assessment.

mainEntity.name: Do I need an immigration lawyer?

acceptedAnswer.text: While not required, an immigration lawyer significantly improves your chances of success. Immigration law is complex and constantly changing. Our attorneys at Vasquez Law Firm ensure your application is complete and accurate.

mainEntity.name: How much does an immigration lawyer cost in Charlotte?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration attorney fees vary by case complexity. Vasquez Law Firm offers competitive rates and payment plans. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO for a free consultation and fee quote.

## Serving Charlotte and Surrounding Areas
Vasquez Law Firm proudly serves clients throughout Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and the greater North Carolina area. With offices conveniently located in Charlotte, we're here to help with all your legal needs.


## Why Choose Vasquez Law Firm?
- **Experienced Attorneys**: Over 20 years of combined legal experience
- **Bilingual Services**: We speak English and Spanish
- **Free Consultation**: Call 1-844-YO-PELEO today
- **Proven Results**: Hundreds of satisfied clients
- **24/7 Availability**: We're here when you need us
